### <a name="method-editlabels"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2293">メソッド editLabels</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2293">Method editLabels</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2294">ユーザーがフォーム リスト コントロールで項目名を変更できるかどうかを示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2294">Indicates whether users can modify item names in a form list control.</span></span>

    public boolean editLabels([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2295">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2295">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2296">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2296">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2297">ユーザーがフォーム リスト コントロール内の項目名を変更できるかどうかを指定するブール値データ型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2297">A Boolean data type that specifies whether users can modify item names in a form list control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2298">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2298">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2299">ユーザーが項目名を変更することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2299">true if users can modify item names; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2300">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2300">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2301">フォーム リスト コントロールに列を追加する前に、editLabels メソッドを呼び出す必要があります。それ以外の場合、列はコントロールに表示されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2301">You must call the editLabels method before you add columns to a form list control; otherwise, the columns do not appear in the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2302">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2302">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2303">次の例は、ユーザーがフォーム リスト コントロール内の項目名を変更できるようにする editLabels メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2303">The following example shows a call to the editLabels method to enable users to modify item names in the form list control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2304">DictField.label メソッドは、フォーム リスト コントロールへの品目として追加される指定のテーブル フィールドのラベルを返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2304">The DictField.label method returns a label for a specified table field that is added as an item to the form list control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2305">while select ステートメントは、CustTable テーブルからアカウント番号を取得し、そのデータをコンテナーに格納します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2305">The while select statement retrieves account numbers from the CustTable table and then stores the data in a container.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2306">変数内の項目は、FormListControl.addItem メソッドを呼び出すことによってフォーム リスト コントロールに追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2306">The items in the variable are added to the form list control by calling the FormListControl.addItem method.</span></span>

    static void createForm2(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        FormListItem formListItem; 
        FormListColumn formListColumn; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        int idx4; 
        str string; 
        container conAccountNum; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        int numAccounts; 
        int i; 
        int item; 
        int numItems; 
        DictField dictField; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.viewType(FormListViewType::Report); 
        formListControl.height(120); 
        formListControl.widthMode(FormWidth::ColumnWidth); 
        formListControl.editLabels(true); 
        // Add a column to the form list control. 
        formListControl.addColumn(1, new FormListColumn("Column1",1,120)); 
        // Add items to the form list control. 
        while select custTable 
            where custTable.AccountNum >= 
     "4000" && custTable.AccountNum <= "4040" 
        { 
            conAccountNum += [[custTable.AccountNum]]; 
        } 
        numAccounts = conlen(conAccountNum); 
        for(i = 1; i <= numAccounts; i++) 
        { 
            string = conPeek(conAccountNum,i); 
            formListItem = new FormListItem(string); 
            item = formListControl.addItem(formListItem); 
            dictField = new DictField(77,1); 
            formListItem = new FormListItem(dictField.label()); 
            item = formListControl.addItem(formListItem); 
        } 
    }

### <a name="method-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2307">メソッド enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2307">Method enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2308">オブジェクトを有効または無効にするかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2308">Determines whether to enable or disable the object.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2311">コントロールが有効かどうかを指定するブール値; オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2311">A Boolean value that specifies whether the control is enabled; optional.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2313">オブジェクトが有効である場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2313">true if the object is enabled; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2314">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2314">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2315">有効になっているプロパティを使用すると、実行時にコントロールを有効または無効にできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2315">The enabled property allows controls to be enabled or disabled at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2316">たとえば、アプリケーションの現在の状態には適用されないオブジェクトを無効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2316">For example, you can disable objects that do not apply to the current state of the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2317">また、読み取り専用情報を提供する、エラー メッセージなどの、表示のためにのみ使用されるコントロールを無効にすることもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2317">You can also disable a control that is used only for display purposes, such as an error message, which provides read-only information.</span></span>

### <a name="method-foregroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2334">メソッド foregroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2334">Method foregroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2335">コントロールのテキストの色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2335">Gets or sets the text color for the control.</span></span>

    public int foregroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2336">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2336">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2337">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2337">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2338">前景色を指定する整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2338">An Integer data type that specifies the foreground color.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2339">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2339">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2340">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2340">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2341">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2341">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2342">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2342">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2343">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2343">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2344">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2344">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2345">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2345">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2346">上位バイトは 0 (ゼロ) でなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2346">The high-order byte must be 0 (zero).</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2347">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2347">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2348">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2348">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2349">次の例は、前景色をデスクトップ上のメニュー テキストの色に設定する foregroundColor メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2349">The following example shows a call to the foregroundColor method to set the foreground color to the color of the menu text on the desktop.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2350">while select ステートメントは、CustTable テーブルからアカウント番号を取得し、そのデータをコンテナーに格納します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2350">The while select statement retrieves account numbers from the CustTable table and then stores the data in a container.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2351">変数内の項目は、FormListControl.addItem メソッドを呼び出すことによってフォーム リスト コントロールに追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2351">The items in the variable are added to the form list control by calling the FormListControl.addItem method.</span></span>

    static void createForm2(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        FormListItem formListItem; 
        FormListColumn formListColumn; 
        int idx4; 
        str string; 
        container conAccountNum; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        int numAccounts; 
        int i; 
        int item; 
        int numItems; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.foregroundColor(WindowsPalette::MenuText); 
        formListControl.viewType(FormListViewType::Report); 
        formListControl.height(120); 
        formListControl.widthMode(FormWidth::ColumnWidth); 
        // Add a column to the form list control. 
        formListControl.addColumn(1, new FormListColumn("Column1")); 
        // Add items to the form list control. 
        while select custTable 
            where custTable.AccountNum >= 
     "4000" && custTable.AccountNum <= "4040" 
        { 
            conAccountNum += [[custTable.AccountNum]]; 
        } 
        numAccounts = conlen(conAccountNum); 
        for(i = 1; i <= numAccounts; i++) 
        { 
            string = conPeek(conAccountNum,i); 
            formListItem = new FormListItem(string); 
            item = formListControl.addItem(formListItem); 
        } 
    }

        int idx4;

        str string; 
        str itemTxt;

        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form.

        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm");

        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List");

        FormListColumn formListColumn; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        int idx4; 
        str string; 
        container conAccountNum; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        int numAccounts; 
        int i; 
        int item; 
        int numItems; 
        int numItemsSel; 
        // Create the form header.

        // Add data sources to the form.

        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name());

     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List");

### <a name="method-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2475">メソッド height</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2475">Method height</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2476">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2476">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int height(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2477">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2477">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2478">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2478">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2479">高さの計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2479">An integer that indicates how the height is calculated; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2480">これは、次のいずれかの値になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2480">This can be one of the following values:</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2481">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2481">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2482">高さの計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2482">An integer that indicates how the height is calculated; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2483">これは、次のいずれかの値になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2483">This can be one of the following values:</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2484">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2484">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2485">ピクセル単位のコントロールの高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2485">The height of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2486">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2486">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2487">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2487">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2488">次の表に従って高さを計算します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2488">Calculate the height according to the following table.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2489">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2489">Mode</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2490">高さの計算</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2490">Height calculation</span></span>                                                                         |
|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2491">-1 - 正確</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2491">-1 – Exact</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2492">ピクセル単位のコントロールの正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2492">The exact height of the control in pixels is used.</span></span>                                         |
| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2493">0 - 自動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2493">0 – Auto</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2494">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2494">The height of the control is calculated automatically, and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2495">1 - 列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2495">1 – Column height</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2496">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2496">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                               |

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2497">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2497">The height and the height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2498">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2498">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2499">次の例は、コントロールの高さを 120 ピクセルに設定する height メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2499">The following example shows a call to the height method to the set the height of the control to 120 pixels.</span></span>

    static void createForm(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        int idx4; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form, and then specifiy the control height. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.height(120,-1); 
    }

### <a name="method-heightmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2500">メソッド heightMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2500">Method heightMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2501">コントロールの高さの計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2501">Gets or sets a calculation mode for the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2502">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2502">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2503">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2503">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2504">コントロールの高さの計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2504">An integer that indicates how the height of the control is calculated; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2505">この値は、 Exact モードの場合は -1、Auto モードの場合は 0、Column height 幅の場合は 1 になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2505">This value can be -1 for Exact mode, 0 for Auto mode, or 1 for Column height width.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2506">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2506">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2507">高さ計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2507">The height calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2508">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2508">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2509">次の表に従って高さを計算します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2509">Calculate the height according to the following table.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2510">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2510">Mode</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2511">高さの計算</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2511">Height calculation</span></span>                                                                         |
|---------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2512">正確</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2512">Exact</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2513">ピクセル単位のコントロールの正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2513">The exact height of the control in pixels is used.</span></span>                                         |
| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2514">自動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2514">Auto</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2515">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2515">The height of the control is calculated automatically, and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2516">1 列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2516">Column height</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2517">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2517">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                               |

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2518">計算モードが [自動] または [列の高さ] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの高さが変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2518">The height of the control might change when the calculation mode is set to Auto or Column height.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2519">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2519">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2520">次の例は、正確なピクセル値に基づいてコントロールの高さを調整する heightMode メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2520">The following example shows a call to the heightMode method to adjust the height of the control, based on an exact pixel value.</span></span>

    static void createForm(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        int idx4; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form, and then specifiy the control height. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.heightMode(-1); 
        formListControl.heightValue(120); 
    }

### <a name="method-isusersetupenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2584">メソッド isUserSetupEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2584">Method isUserSetupEnabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2585">コントロールが、特定のレベルのカスタマイズを許可するかどうかを示す値を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2585">Gets a value that indicates whether the control allows for the specified level of customization.</span></span>

    public boolean isUserSetupEnabled(int neededSetupRights)

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2586">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2586">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2587">neededSetupRights</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2587">neededSetupRights</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2588">コントロールに対して照会されるカスタマイズのレベルを指定する FormAllowUserSetup 列挙値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2588">A FormAllowUserSetup enumeration value that specifies the level of customization that is being queried for the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2589">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2589">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2590">neededSetupRights パラメーターで指定されたカスタマイズのレベルがコントロール、デザイン、および親コンテナーで許可される場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2590">true if the control, design, and parent containers allow for the level of customization that is specified by the neededSetupRights parameter; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2591">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2591">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2592">「true」を返すこのメソッドについては、デザインの AllowUserSetup プロパティとすべての親コンテナが、neededSetupRights パラメータで指定されたアクセスレベルを許可している必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2592">For this method to return true, the AllowUserSetup property for the design and all parent containers must allow for the level of access that is specified by the neededSetupRights parameter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2593">次のテーブルでは、neededSetupRights パラメーターの値について説明します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2593">The following table describes the values for the neededSetupRights parameter.</span></span>

|                                  |                                                                                                                                  |
|----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2594">FormAllowUserSetup::No 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2594">FormAllowUserSetup::No 0</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2595">コントロールに対する変更は加えられません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2595">No changes can be made to the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2596">この値が neededSetupRights パラメーターに対して設定されている場合、メソッドは常に true を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2596">If this value is set for the neededSetupRights parameter, the method always returns true.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2597">FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2597">FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted 1</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2598">ユーザーはコントロールの、編集可能、表示、スキップ、ラベル、幅の各プロパティを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2598">The user can change the editable, visible, skip, label, and width properties of the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2599">ユーザーがコントロールを移動できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2599">The user cannot move the control.</span></span>   |
| <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2600">FormAllowUserSetup::Yes 2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2600">FormAllowUserSetup::Yes 2</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2601">ユーザーはコントロールの、編集可能、表示、スキップ、ラベル、幅の各プロパティを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2601">The user can change the editable, visible, skip, label, and width properties of the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2602">ユーザーはコントロールを移動することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2602">The user can also move the control.</span></span> |

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2603">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2603">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2604">次の例は、コントロールのユーザー設定権限を決定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2604">The following example shows how to determine the user setup rights for a control.</span></span>

    FormAllowUserSetup formAllowUserSetup = FormAllowUserSetup::No; 
    switch (true) 
    { 
        case this.isUserSetupEnabled(FormAllowUserSetup::Yes): 
            formAllowUserSetup = FormAllowUserSetup::Yes; 
            break; 
        case this.isUserSetupEnabled(FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted): 
            formAllowUserSetup = FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted; 
            break; 
        case this.isUserSetupEnabled(FormAllowUserSetup::No): 
           formAllowUserSetup = FormAllowUserSetup::No; 
            break; 
    } 
    info (strfmt("formAllowUserSetup: %1", formAllowUserSetup));

### <a name="method-left"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2631">メソッド left</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2631">Method left</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2632">フォーム リスト コントロールの水平位置をピクセル単位で設定するか返し、位置を計算する方法を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2632">Sets or returns the horizontal position of a form list control in pixels, and specifies how the position is calculated.</span></span>

    public int left(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2633">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2633">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2635">位置の計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2635">An integer that indicates how the position is calculated; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2636">これは、次のいずれかの値になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2636">This can be one of the following values:</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2637">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2637">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2638">位置の計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2638">An integer that indicates how the position is calculated; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2639">これは、次のいずれかの値になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2639">This can be one of the following values:</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2640">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2640">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2641">フォーム リスト コントロールの水平位置をピクセル単位で示す整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2641">An integer that indicates the horizontal position of a form list control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2642">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2642">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2643">次の例は、水平方向の位置を 50 ピクセルに設定する left メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2643">The following example shows a call to the left method that sets the horizontal position to 50 pixels.</span></span>

    static void createForm(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        int idx4; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.left(50,-1); 
    }

### <a name="method-leftmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2644">メソッド leftMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2644">Method leftMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2645">フォーム リスト コントロールの水平位置を計算する方法を示す値を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2645">Sets or returns a value that indicates how the horizontal position of a form list control is calculated.</span></span>

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2646">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2646">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2648">水平位置の計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2648">An integer that indicates how the horizontal position is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2649">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2649">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2650">水平位置の計算方法を示す整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2650">An integer that indicates how the horizontal position is calculated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2651">戻り値は、-1 または FormLeft 列挙値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2651">The return value can be -1 or a FormLeft enumeration value.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2652">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2652">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2653">value パラメーターと戻り値は、水平位置の計算方法を指定する整数値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2653">The value parameter and the return value are integer values that specify how the horizontal position is calculated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2654">この値は、正確なピクセル値の場合は -1、FormLeft 列挙値の場合は -1 のいずれかになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2654">This value can be either -1 for an exact pixel value or a FormLeft enumeration value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2655">詳細については、「FormLeft 列挙」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2655">For more information, see FormLeft Enumeration.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2656">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2656">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2657">次の例は、正確なピクセル値に基づいて、フォーム リスト コントロールの水平方向位置を計算する leftMode メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2657">The following example shows a call to the leftMode method that calculates the horizontal position of a form list control, based on an exact pixel value.</span></span>

    static void createForm(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        int idx4; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form.  
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.leftMode(-1); 
        formListControl.leftValue(100); 
    }

### <a name="method-leftvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2658">メソッド leftValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2658">Method leftValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2659">フォーム リスト コントロールの水平位置をピクセル単位で設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2659">Sets or returns the horizontal position of a form list control in pixels.</span></span>

    public int leftValue([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2660">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2660">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2661">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2661">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2662">水平位置をピクセル単位で示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2662">An integer that indicates the horizontal position in pixels; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2663">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2663">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2664">水平位置をピクセル単位で示す整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2664">An integer that indicates the horizontal position in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2665">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2665">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2666">正確なピクセル値に左モードが設定されていない限り、水平位置は変更されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2666">The horizontal position is not changed unless the left mode is set for an exact pixel value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2667">詳細については、「leftMode」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2667">For more information, see leftMode.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2668">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2668">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2669">次の例は、水平方向の位置を 100 ピクセルに設定する leftValue メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2669">The following example shows a call to the leftValue method that sets the horizontal position to 100 pixels.</span></span>

    static void createForm(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        int idx4; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form, and then specifiy the control height. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.leftMode(-1); 
        formListControl.leftValue(100); 
    }

### <a name="method-moveitem"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2747">メソッド moveItem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2747">Method moveItem</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2748">指定した項目をフォーム リスト コントロールに移動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2748">Moves a specified item in a form list control.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2751">品目が移動されるリスト内の位置を指定する整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2751">An Integer data type that specifies the position in the list that the item is moved to.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2752">InsertAt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2752">InsertAt</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2753">品目が移動されるリスト内の位置を指定する整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2753">An Integer data type that specifies the position in the list that the item is moved to.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2754">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2754">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2755">品目が移動されるリスト内の位置を指定する整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2755">An Integer data type that specifies the position in the list that the item is moved to.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2756">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2756">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2757">次の例は、フォーム リスト コントロールの 10 番目の位置にアイテムを移動する moveItem メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2757">The following example shows a call to the moveItem method to move an item to the tenth position in the form list control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2758">FormListControl.getCount メソッドは、コントロール内の項目の数を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2758">The FormListControl.getCount method returns the number of items in the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2759">while select ステートメントは、CustTable テーブルからアカウント番号を取得し、そのデータをコンテナーに格納します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2759">The while select statement retrieves account numbers from the CustTable table and then stores the data in a container.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2760">変数内の項目は、FormListControl.addItem メソッドを呼び出すことによってフォーム リスト コントロールに追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2760">The items in the variable are added to the form list control by calling the FormListControl.addItem method.</span></span>

    static void createForm2(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        FormListItem formListItem; 
        FormListColumn formListColumn; 
        int idx4; 
        str string; 
        container conAccountNum; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        int numAccounts; 
        int i; 
        int item; 
        int numItems; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(77); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = new FormRun(Args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.viewType(FormListViewType::Report); 
        formListControl.height(120); 
        formListControl.widthMode(FormWidth::ColumnWidth); 
        // Add columns to the form list control. 
        formListControl.addColumn(1, new FormListColumn("Account Numbers",1,120)); 
        // Add items to the form list control. 
        while select custTable 
            where custTable.AccountNum >= 
                "4000" && custTable.AccountNum <= "4040" 
        { 
            conAccountNum += [[custTable.AccountNum]]; 
        } 
        numAccounts = conlen(conAccountNum); 
        for(i = 1; i <= numAccounts; i++) 
        { 
            string = conPeek(conAccountNum,i); 
            formListItem = new FormListItem(string); 
            item = formListControl.addItem(formListItem); 
        } 
        formListControl.getCount(); 
        formListControl.moveItem(2,10); 
    }

### <a name="method-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2761">メソッド名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2761">Method name</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2762">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または他のアプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2762">Gets or sets the name that is used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or other Finance and Operations application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2763">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2763">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2764">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2764">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2765">コントロールに割り当てる名前 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2765">The name to assign to the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2766">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2766">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2767">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2767">The name that is used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2768">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2768">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2769">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2769">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2770">文字で始める必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2770">It must start with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2771">250 文字を超えることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2771">It cannot exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2772">数字とアンダースコア (\_) 文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2772">It can include numbers and underscore (\_) characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2773">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2773">It cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2774">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2774">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enums, or classes.</span></span>

### <a name="method-rowselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2804">メソッド rowSelect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2804">Method rowSelect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2805">行をクリックしたときにフォーム リスト コントロールの行が選択されているかどうかを示すブール値データ型値を設定または取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2805">Sets or gets a Boolean data type value that indicates whether a row in a form list control is selected when the row is clicked.</span></span>

    public boolean rowSelect([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2806">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2806">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2807">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2807">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2808">行をクリックしたときにフォーム リスト コントロールの行が選択されているかどうかを示すブール値データ型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2808">A Boolean data type that indicates whether a row in a form list control is selected when the row is clicked.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2811">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2811">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2812">次の例は、行がクリックされたときにフォーム リスト コントロール内の行が選択されるように指定する、rowSelect メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2812">The following example shows a call to the rowSelect method to specify that a row in the form list control is selected when the row is clicked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2813">while select ステートメントは、CustTable テーブルからアカウント番号を取得し、そのデータをコンテナーに格納します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2813">The while select statement retrieves account numbers from the CustTable table and then stores the data in a container.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2814">変数内の項目は、FormListControl.addItem メソッドを呼び出すことによってフォーム リスト コントロールに追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2814">The items in the variable are added to the form list control by calling the FormListControl.addItem method.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2815">列は、FormListControl.addItem メソッドを呼び出すことによってフォーム リスト コントロールに追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2815">The columns are added to the form list control by calling the FormListControl.addItem method.</span></span>

    static void createForm2(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        FormListItem formListItem; 
        FormListColumn formListColumn1; 
        FormListColumn formListColumn2; 
        FormListColumn formListColumn; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        int idx4; 
        str string; 
        container conAccountNum; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        int numAccounts; 
        int i; 
        int item; 
        int numItems; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.viewType(FormListViewType::Report); 
        formListControl.height(120); 
        formListControl.widthMode(FormWidth::ColumnWidth); 
        formListControl.rowSelect(true); 
        // Add columns to the form list control. 
        formListControl.addColumn(1, new FormListColumn("Column1",1,120)); 
        formListControl.addColumn(2, new FormListColumn("Column2",2,120)); 
        // Add items to the form list control. 
        while select custTable

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2839">フォーム リスト コントロール内の列の幅を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2839">Specifies the width of a column in a form list control.</span></span>

    public boolean setColumnWidth(int Idx, int Width)

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2843">幅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2843">Width</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2844">フォーム リスト コントロール内で列の幅を指定する整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2844">An Integer data type that specifies the width of the column in a form list control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2845">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2845">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2846">幅がセットされている場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2846">true if the width is set; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2847">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2847">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2848">フォーム リスト コントロールに列を表示するには、FormListControl.viewType メソッドを呼び出して、FormListViewType::Report 列挙値を渡します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2848">To display columns in a form list control, call the FormListControl.viewType method, and then pass the FormListViewType::Report enumeration value.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2849">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2849">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2850">次の例は、フォーム リスト コントロール内の列の幅を指定する setColumnWidth メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2850">The following example shows a call to the setColumnWidth method to specify the width of the column in the form list control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2851">FormListControl.addColumn メソッドは、列をフォーム リスト コントロールに追加します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2851">The FormListControl.addColumn method adds the column to the form list control.</span></span>

    static void createForm2(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        FormListItem formListItem; 
        FormListColumn formListColumn; 
        int idx4; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.viewType(FormListViewType::Report); 
        formListControl.height(120); 
        formListControl.widthMode(FormWidth::ColumnWidth); 
        // Add a column to the form list control, and then set the column width. 
        formListControl.addColumn(1, new FormListColumn("Column1")); 
        formListControl.setColumnWidth(0,100); 
    }

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2860">次の例は、各項目がフォーム リスト コントロールに含まれているかどうかを判断する setItem メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2860">The following example shows a call to the setItem method to determine whether each item is contained in the form list control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2861">while select ステートメントは、CustTable テーブルからアカウント番号を取得し、そのデータをコンテナーに格納します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2861">The while select statement retrieves account numbers from the CustTable table and then stores the data in a container.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2862">変数内の項目は、FormListControl.addItem メソッドを呼び出すことによってフォーム リスト コントロールに追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2862">The items in the variable are added to the form list control by calling the FormListControl.addItem method.</span></span>

    static void createForm2(Args _args)

        str string; 
        container conAccountNum; 
        CustTable custTable;

        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4);

        while select custTable 
            where custTable.AccountNum >= 
                "4000" && custTable.AccountNum <= "4040"

            conAccountNum += [[custTable.AccountNum]];

        numAccounts = conlen(conAccountNum);

            item = formListControl.addItem(formListItem); 
            itemSet = formListControl.setItem(formListItem); 
        } 
    }

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2891">次の例は、複数の項目を選択できるように指定するための singleSelection メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2891">The following example shows a call to the singleSelection method to specify that multiple items can be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2892">while select ステートメントは、CustTable テーブルからアカウント番号を取得し、そのデータをコンテナーに格納します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2892">The while select statement retrieves account numbers from the CustTable table and then stores the data in a container.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2893">変数内の項目は、FormListControl.addItem メソッドを呼び出すことによってフォーム リスト コントロールに追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2893">The items in the variable are added to the form list control by calling the FormListControl.addItem method.</span></span>

    static void testFormListControl(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl;

        // Create the form header.

        // Add data sources to the form.

        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form.

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2922">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2922">mode</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2925">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2925">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2926">フォーム リスト コントロールの垂直位置をピクセル単位で示す整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2926">An integer that indicates the vertical position of a form list control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2927">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2927">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2928">次の例は、垂直位置を 50 ピクセルに設定する top メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2928">The following example shows a call to the top method to set the vertical position to 50 pixels.</span></span>

    static void createForm(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        int idx4; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.top(50,-1); 
    }

### <a name="method-topmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2929">メソッド topMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2929">Method topMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2930">フォーム リスト コントロールの垂直位置を計算する方法を示す値を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2930">Sets or returns a value that indicates how the vertical position for a form list control is calculated.</span></span>

    public int topMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2931">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2931">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2932">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2932">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2933">垂直位置の計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2933">An integer that indicates how the vertical position is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2934">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2934">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2935">垂直位置の計算方法を示す整数データ型値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2935">An Integer data type value that indicates how the vertical position is calculated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2936">戻り値は、-1 または FormTop 列挙値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2936">The return value can be -1 or a FormTop enumeration value.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2937">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2937">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2938">value パラメーターと戻り値は、正確なピクセル値の場合は -1、FormTop 列挙値または -1 のいずれかの整数値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2938">The value parameter and return value are integer values that can be either -1 for an exact pixel value or a FormTop enumeration value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-2939">詳細については、「FormTop 列挙」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2939">For more information, see FormTop Enumeration.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-2940">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2940">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-2941">次の例は、正確なピクセル値に基づいて垂直位置を計算する topMode メソッドの呼び出しを示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-2941">The following example shows a call to the topMode method that calculates the vertical position based on an exact pixel value.</span></span>

    static void createForm(Args _args) 
    { 
        Args args; 
        Form form; 
        FormRun formRun; 
        FormBuildDesign formBuildDesign; 
        FormBuildDataSource formBuildDataSource; 
        FormBuildListControl formBuildListControl; 
        FormListControl formListControl; 
        int idx4; 
        DictTable dictTable; 
        CustTable custTable; 
        // Create the form header. 
        form = new Form(); 
        // Add data sources to the form. 
        dictTable = new DictTable(tableNum(custTable)); 
        formBuildDataSource = form.addDataSource(dictTable.name()); 
        formBuildDataSource.table(dictTable.id()); 
        // Create the form design. 
        formBuildDesign = form.addDesign("Design"); 
        formBuildDesign.caption("myForm"); 
        // Add a form list control. 
        formBuildListControl = 
     formBuildDesign.addControl(FormControlType::ListView,"List"); 
        idx4 = formBuildListControl.id(); 
        args = new Args(); 
        args.object(form); 
        // Create the run-time form. 
        formRun = classfactory.formRunClass(args); 
        formRun.run(); 
        formRun.detach(); 
        formListControl = formRun.control(idx4); 
        formListControl.topMode(-1); 
        formListControl.topValue(50); 
    }

### <a name="method-userhide"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3012">メソッド userHide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3012">Method userHide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3013">コントロールがユーザーから非表示になっているかどうかを示す値を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3013">Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the control is hidden from the user.</span></span>

    public int userHide([int value])

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3018">コントロールがユーザーから非表示になっている場合は 1、それ以外の場合は、0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3018">1 if the control is hidden from the user; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3019">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3019">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3020">ユーザーは、コントロールが表示されたときにコントロールを右クリックするか、元のコントロールが非表示のときに他のコントロールを右クリックして、コントロールを非表示にするかどうかを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3020">The user specifies whether a control is hidden by right-clicking the control when it is viewable or by right-clicking another control when the original control is hidden.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-3021">右クリックにより、コントロールを非表示または表示するために使用できるメニューを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3021">A right-click opens a menu that can be used to hide or display the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-3022">このメソッドを使用すると、プログラムによって値を決定して設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3022">This method lets you programmatically determine and set the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3052">ユーザーが Tab キーを押してフォーム内のコントロールを移動するときにフォーム コントロールがスキップされるかどうかを示す値を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3052">Sets or returns the value that indicates whether the form control is skipped when the user presses the TAB key to navigate the controls in the form.</span></span>

    public int userSkip([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3053">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3053">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3054">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3054">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3055">userSkip プロパティに割り当てる値 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3055">The value to assign to the userSkip property; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-3056">コントロールをスキップするユーザーの設定が有効な場合、この値は 1、それ以外の場合は 0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3056">The value is 1 if the user setting to skip the control is in effect; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3057">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3057">Return Value</span></span>

### <a name="method-userwidth"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3059">メソッド userWidth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3059">Method userWidth</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3060">ユーザーによって指定されたコントロールの幅をピクセル単位で設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3060">Sets or returns the width of the control in pixels, as specified by the user.</span></span>

    public int userWidth([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3061">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3061">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3062">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3062">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3063">コントロールの幅として使用するピクセル数 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3063">The number of pixels to use as the width of the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3064">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3064">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3065">ユーザーがコントロールの幅として指定したピクセル数。ユーザーが文字の幅を指定しなかった場合は 0 (ゼロ)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3065">The number of pixels that the user specified as the width of the control; 0 (zero) if the user did not specify a character width.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3066">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3066">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3067">userWidth メソッドは、文字数の 6 倍に基づいてピクセル単位の幅を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3067">The userWidth method returns the width in pixels, based on six times the number of characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-3068">たとえば、ユーザーのコントロールの幅として 30 文字が指定されている場合、戻り値は 6 \* 30 = 180 となります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3068">For example, if the user has specified 30 characters as the width of the control, the return value is 6 \* 30 = 180.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="72c86-3069">コントロールの幅を文字で指定するには、コントロールを右クリックして、文字指定を行う設定フォームを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3069">To specify the width of the control in characters, users can right-click the control to open the setup form where the character specification is made.</span></span>

### <a name="method-verticalspacing"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3070">メソッド verticalSpacing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3070">Method verticalSpacing</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3071">ピクセルでフォーム リスト コントロールの上と下のスペースの量を設定または取得し、スペースを計算する方法を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3071">Sets or gets the amount of space above and below a form list control in pixels, and specifies how the space is calculated.</span></span>

    public int verticalSpacing([int value], [AutoMode mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3072">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3072">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3073">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3073">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3074">領域の計算方法を示す AutoMode システムの列挙値、オプションです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3074">An AutoMode system enumeration value that indicates how the space is calculated; optional.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3075">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3075">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3076">領域の計算方法を示す AutoMode システムの列挙値、オプションです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3076">An AutoMode system enumeration value that indicates how the space is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3077">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3077">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3078">コントロールの上と下のスペースの量を示す整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3078">An integer that indicates the amount of space above and below a control.</span></span>

### <a name="method-verticalspacingmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3079">メソッド verticalSpacingMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3079">Method verticalSpacingMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3080">フォーム リスト コントロールの上と下のスペースを計算する方法を示す値を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3080">Sets or returns a value that indicates how the space above and below a form list control is calculated.</span></span>

    public AutoMode verticalSpacingMode([AutoMode mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3081">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3081">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3082">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3082">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3083">領域の計算方法を示す AutoMode システムの列挙値、オプションです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3083">An AutoMode system enumeration value that indicates how the space is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="72c86-3084">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3084">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="72c86-3085">スペースがフォント サイズなどの他のフォーム設定に基づいて自動的に調整される場合は自動です。そうでなければ、固定です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="72c86-3085">Auto if the space is automatically adjusted based on other form settings, such as the font size; otherwise, Fixed.</span></span>
